title: Honor level, cant tell my progress or if its even working
body: I was banned 14 days like 2 or 3 months  ago and got my honor level down to 0 or Dishonorable and i been playing alot and still no progress, when i first started i climb up to honor 4 and it didnt took that long not even the month, so i dont get why am i still dishonorable and i cant open chest because am not getting keys or anything at all, riot said that you could get up to 2 capsules a month, i think am not sure but in my case i get none. Please Help :(

replies.body: So basically, your honor progress hasn't been going up as fast as it did before due to some borderline dishonorable behavior. Your loot will unlock once it's been shown that you're honorable again, but there are some chat logs that showed borderline punishable behavior. If you want more context on exactly what happened, feel free to hit up the player behavior agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Being deemed as reformed or that you are reforming by the system takes longer the harsher the punishment you got, and a 14 day ban is the second harshest punishment you can get, and will take many games to go up even 1 lvl. I remember getting a 25 game chat restriction, and it took like 20 games to go up to lvl 1 honor.
